name: 2 Pak Special: Planet Patrol / Wall Defender
overview: Compilation featuring Spectravision's "Planet Patrol" (1982) and Home Vision's "Wall Break" (1982). Box description: PLANET PATROL Your assignment is to patrol your planet day and night. As you fly your space craft you must avoid enemy fire and destroy their spaceships. Don't forget to refuel occasionally or this could make your mission a short one. Beware of sunset because as soon as the night creeps in, the dark makes your task become impossible. For one or two players using joysticks. WALL DEFENDER Your city is under the most vicious alien attack. Your mission is to guard the city walls and prevent them from collapsing. Endless waves of enemy ships fill the horizon, but with careful aim and quick reflexes you can eliminate them one by one. Success will make you a hero to be remembered. One Player using Joystick.
